properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM CLASS_POST WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT P.POST_NO , B.BOARD_NAME , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME AS "PROFILE_PATH" , P.POST_TITLE , TO_CHAR(P.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD DY HH24:MI') AS "CREATE_DATE" , NVL(CC.COMMENT_COUNT, 0) AS "COMMENT_COUNT" , NVL(FC.FILE_COUNT, 0) AS "FILE_COUNT" FROM CLASS_POST P JOIN CLASS_BOARD B ON P.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO JOIN USERS U ON P.USER_NO = U.USER_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT REF_NO, COUNT(*) AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM COMMENTS GROUP BY REF_NO) CC ON CC.REF_NO = P.POST_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT REF_BNO, COUNT(DISTINCT FILE_NO) AS FILE_COUNT FROM ATTACHMENT GROUP BY REF_BNO) FC ON FC.REF_BNO = P.POST_NO LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON U.PROFILE_FILE_NO = A.FILE_NO WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY P.POST_NO , B.BOARD_NAME , U.USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , A.FILE_PATH || A.CHANGE_NAME , P.POST_TITLE , P.CREATE_DATE , NVL(CC.COMMENT_COUNT, 0) , NVL(FC.FILE_COUNT, 0) ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
